attributes.action: NOT hand over the royal navy to the european navy force
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
No....no....no....thats the simply answer. Of course europe want the royal navy to join, its always been known that the royal navy is the best in the world, thats why it has to stay british, not european. France is only wantiong this to happen because they have such a problem with the US and always want to be a bigger super power. Just drop it france, the royal navy is fine on its own and as ireland proved, we dont want to be part of europe....end of story. As for Gordon Brown, grow some cahoonas and stop selling our country down the river, tell europe where to stick it, the british servicemen who died protecting our shores, to keep our indenpendence, must be turning in their graves. The britsh government should be ashamed, because i certainly am......

sign this petition today to show the government that we are fed up with having our country sold down the river and falling at the knees of Europe...its time to act before its too late....

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
